src:
Wawancara Iwan Bule: Timnas U-23 Diminta Bawa Pulang Emas
07 Nov 2019, 07:01 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ketua Umum PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan, menyambangi penginapan para pemain Timnas U-23 Indonesia yang akan berlaga di SEA Games 2019 Manila, Filipina. Kegiatan itu ia lakukan tak lama usai terpilih menjadi orang nomor satu di federasi sepak bola Indonesia dalam kongres luar biasa yang digelar 2 November 2019. Pria yang lebih akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini tidak hanya menyapa dan memberi semangat kepada Timnas U-23, tapi juga para pemain yang memperkuat Timnas U-19. Mereka ini tengah melakoni pertandingan Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. "Mereka itu kami harus sentuh secara psikologis bahwa mereka anak-anak kami," kata Iwan Bule di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.Tempo berkesempatan mewawancarai khusus Iwan Bule tentang berbagai hal. Salah satunya ialah mengenai Timnas U-23 di SEA Games 2019. Berikut kutipan wawancara lengkapnya:Apa yang mendorong Anda menemui pemain Timnas U-23?Saya (sedang) fokus ke SEA Games. Makanya saya langsung dari Kelapa Dua ke sini untuk memompa semangat pemain Timnas. Saya memberikan spirit dan semangat kepada mereka. Itu perlu dilakukan oleh ketua dan jajarannya.Memang capek. Tapi itu risiko ketua dan jajaran wakil ketua. Karena mereka itu harus kami sentuh secara psikologis bahwa mereka anak-anak kami. Mereka berangkat untuk bertempur atau mungkin melakukan pekerjaan yang mengharumkan nama bangsa. Mudah-mudahan dengan langkah-langkah yang kami lakukan memberikan spirit dan semangat yang tinggi bagi mereka. Target tetap emas di SEA Games nanti?Pastilah. Kalau SEA Games, saya minta target itu. Tapi mereka, kami harus beri pemahaman. Jadi bola itu bundar. Manakala dia menang, mereka jangan terlalu besar kepala. Sehingga nanti mereka tidak terlalu takabur. Karena begitu kalah satu kali pasti bakal dicaci maki. Itu risiko. Tapi sekali lagi saya sampaikan seperti Timnas (U-19) yang akan main. Mereka dengan tipikal Timor Leste, mereka akan bermain keras dan memancing emosi. Saya sampaikan itu, jangan terpancing.Kita tahu usia mereka masih muda. Ada 16, 17, 19 tahun, emosi mereka masih betul-betul luar biasa. Itu yang saya sampaikan ke mereka.SEA Games ada janji bonus Timnas?Nanti kita lihat. Saya akan diskusikan. Saya akan bicara dengan teman-teman. Saya yakin kalau mereka prestasinya bagus pasti teman-teman dan saya berpikir ke sana. Biasa reward and punisment harus kami lakukan. Tapi yang penting itu memompa semangat mereka. IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
Interview with Iwan Bule: U-23 national team asked to take gold home
Nov 7 2019, 07:01 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - General Chairman of PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan, visited the lodging of Indonesian U-23 national team players who will compete at the 2019 SEA Games in Manila, Philippines. The activity he did shortly after being elected number one in the Indonesian soccer federation in an extraordinary congress held on November 2, 2019. The man who is more familiarly called Iwan Bule not only greeted and encouraged the U-23 national team, but also the players who strengthen the U-19 national team. They are in the midst of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup. "We must touch psychologically that they are our children," said Iwan Bule at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019. Tempo had the opportunity to interview Iwan Bule specifically about various things. One of them is about the U-23 national team at the 2019 SEA Games. Following is the complete interview excerpt: What motivated you to meet the U-23 national team players? I (currently) focus on the SEA Games. So I went straight from Kelapa Dua to here to pump up the spirit of the national team players. I give spirit and encouragement to them. That needs to be done by the chairman and his staff. But that is the risk of the chairman and the ranks of the vice chairman. Because we have to touch psychologically that they are our children. They set out to fight or maybe do work that promotes the nation's name. Hopefully the steps we take will give them high spirits and enthusiasm. The target is still golden at the SEA Games later? For SEA Games, I ask for the target. But they are, we have to give understanding. So the ball is round. When he wins, they should not be too big-headed. So that later they are not too arrogant. Because once you lose once, you will be scolded. That's a risk. But once again I say like the national team (U-19) who will play. They are typical of Timor Leste, they will play hard and provoke emotions. I say that, don't be provoked. We know that they are still young. There are 16, 17, 19 years old, their emotions are still truly extraordinary. That's what I conveyed to them. SEA Games has a national team bonus promise? Later we will see. I will discuss. I will talk with friends. I am sure that if they have a good performance, my friends and I will definitely go there. We have to do regular rewards and punishments. But the important thing is pumping their spirits. IRSYAN HASYIM
